channel.title: Washington on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Washington on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: WA-274 - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on WA-274 west.

item.title: I-90 West - Exit 299 (Washington)
item.description: I-90 west approaching Washington Exit 299 - State Line/Weigh Station.

item.title: US-2 West - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on US-2 west at ID-41 jct. Use ID-41 south for Spirit Lake and Coeur d’Alene. US-2 west for Newport and Spokane.

item.title: US-2 East at Idaho Border - Signed As ID-41
item.description: ID-41 signage on US-2 approaching the Idaho state line. Approaching ID-41 jct., although this sign does not specify that.

item.title: End ID-41 North at US-2
item.description: End ID-41north at US-2 - west to Newport/City Center; east to Priest River/Sandpoint. ID-41 is the dividing line between Washington and Idaho.

item.title: End ID-41 North at US-2
item.description: End ID-41 north at US-2. ID-41 through Oldtown is on the state line. The east side of the street is in Idaho; the west side in Washington.

item.title: WA-290 West - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome to Washington on WA-290 west. Taken at the Idaho-Washington border.

item.title: End WA-409 - Puget Island Ferry
item.description: History of Puget Island Ferry at end of WA-409, on the ferry dock.

item.title: End WA-409 - Puget Island Ferry Fees
item.description: Ferry schedule and fares for Puget Island Ferry, which goes across the Columbia River to Westport, OR. Current auto fare: $3.00

item.title: Ferry Ramp - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome To Washington sign looking up ramp from Puget Island Ferry on WA-409.

item.title: I-5 North - Entering Washington
item.description: Entering Washington on I-5 north, on the Interstate Bridge over the Columbia River.

item.title: US-101 South at WA-401
item.description: US-101 south approaching Astoria Megler Bridge to US-30.

item.title: US-101 South at WA-401 to Longview
item.description: US-101 south at WA-401 north to Longview.

item.title: WA-409 - Welcome To Washington
item.description: Welcome To Washington at end of ramp from Puget Island Ferry on WA-409.

item.title: Welcome To Washington - Puget Island Ferry
item.description: Closeup of Welcome To Washington sign at end of ramp from Puget Island Ferry on WA-409.

item.title: WA-272 West - Whitman County
item.description: WA-272 West in Whitman County. Taken just west of the Idaho-Washington line.
